Question: This person has been tried on drug-related charges five times: in 1967, twice in 1973, in 1977 and in 1978.
Hints: In August 2007 this person signed a publishing deal for his autobiography, Life, which was released 26 October 2010.
In December 1974 this person also made a guest appearance at a Faces concert.
This person was inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 1993.
